pageContext.claim: “You were down to 44 people, and it was getting ready to close up. Then a lot of good things came along. … This contract will support your 1,500 full-time employees, and it will also enable you to hire another 1,000 people all across the shipyards in Wisconsin. It's one of the biggest contracts you've ever seen in the state. An estimated 15,000 additional new jobs will be created through the Wisconsin supply chain. … 9,000 more jobs are going to be generated because of the chain itself.”
pageContext.analysis: The Wisconsin shipyard Trump is referring to had 1,000 employees and was not going to close. The Trump administration awarded a $5.5 billion contract to build 10 Navy ships, which is estimated will add another 1,000 jobs.
